1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content encoder.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Encode
6  ( contentString,
7    mixBracketList,
8    mixBracketSet,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                   as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                     as T
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Complex       as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Content       as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Edge          as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple        as D
18
19
20-- ----------------------  Encode
21
22-- | Encode content to string.
23--
24--   >>> contentString (the $ pText "a")
25--   "a"
26--
27contentString :: (D.CContent c) => c -> String
28contentString = B.mixToFlatString. contentStringMix
29
30-- | Convert content to pretty print doc.
31contentStringMix :: (D.CContent c) => c -> B.MixText
32contentStringMix c
33    | D.isCode   c  = B.mix $ D.gCode c
34    | D.isText   c  = B.mix $ D.gText c
35    | D.isTerm   c  = B.mix $ S.termNameChars $ D.gTerm c
36    | D.isDec    c  = B.mixString $ T.encodeDecimalCompact $ D.gDec c
37    | D.isClock  c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gClock c
38    | D.isTime   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gTime c
39    | D.isBool   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gBool c
40    | D.isEmpty  c  = B.mixEmpty
41    | D.isEnd    c  = B.mixString "(/)"
42
43    | D.isList   c  = mixBracketList $ B.mixJoinBar $ map contentStringMix $ D.gList c
44    | D.isSet    c  = mixBracketSet  $ B.mixJoinBar $ map contentStringMix $ D.gSet c 
45    | D.isTie    c  = B.mixString "<tie>"
46    | D.isRel    c  = B.mixString "<rel>"
47    | D.isInterp c  = B.mixString "<interp>"
48    | D.isType   c  = B.mixString "<type>"
49    | otherwise     = B.mixString "<?>"
50
51-- | Enclose mix text in list brackets.
52--
53--   >>> mixBracketList $ B.mixString "a"
54--   MixText "[ a ]"
55--
56mixBracketList :: B.MixText -> B.MixText
57mixBracketList = S.bracketWith S.bracketList
58
59-- | Enclose mix text in set brackets.
60--
61--   >>> mixBracketSet $ B.mixString "a"
62--   MixText "{ a }"
63--
64mixBracketSet :: B.MixText -> B.MixText
65mixBracketSet = S.bracketWith S.bracketSet
66
